episode.title: All of Us Assholes in Journalism
episode.rawTitle: 114: ‘All of Us Assholes in Journalism’ With Guest Serenity Caldwell
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Serenity Caldwell joins the show. Topics include last week’s “Spring Forward” Apple media event; the new Force Touch Trackpad for MacBooks, and the prospects for force touch in future iOS devices; and of course, Apple Watch.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest Serenity Caldwell joins the show. Topics include last week’s “Spring Forward” Apple media event; the new Force Touch Trackpad for MacBooks, and the prospects for force touch in future iOS devices; and of course, Apple Watch.

Sponsored by:

  • Foremost Edition: Small-batch, American-made clothing line for men and women. Use the code “PROMOCODE” at checkout to receive 20 percent off.

  • Harry’s: An exceptional shave for a fraction of the price. Use coupon code “talkshow” and save $5 on your first order.
  • Squarespace: A better web starts with your website. Use promo code “jg” for 10 percent off.

Links:

  • Jacqui Cheng’s review of the original 2008 MacBook Air for Ars Technica.
  • Christopher Phin fondly remembers the PowerBook Duo.
  • Greg Koenig: “How the Apple Watch Is Made”.
  • Luma Loop — high quality, well-designed camera strap.
  • Serenity’s MacBook Air accident this week.
  • The Atari 400 and its craptacular keyboard.
